segments.text: Would you like to come by and play bridge ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let's see.Why don't we go dancing for a change ? We haven't done that for a long time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , to tell the truth , I don't really feel like it tonight . I had a pretty hard day and I'm sort of tired .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm.Well , in that case , we could go to the movies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , we always go to the movies.Can ' t we do something different ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , do you have any suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's see.How do you feel about playing bridge ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's OK with me , but we don't have any beer and things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , shall I call Janet and ask her and Tom to come over , and I'll go to the store and buy some stuff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Janet.It ' s me ... Oh , fine.Just fine.Say , Janet , I was wondering if you and Tom were doing anything tonight ... No ? Well.would you like to come by our place and play a few hands of bridge ?
segments.speaker: S1
